desc: Simply Candles is based in Loburn in the South Island. All products are hand-made by the owner (Nadia) with love and care, using natural soy wax and scented fragrance oils. Products made: Wood wick scented soy candles (various sizes), scented soy melts, scented tealight candles. We offer a candle refill service.

layout.text: Scented wood wick soy candles and scented soy melts.
